english.segment1: The sun will shine. I'll smile from time to time. And sin the song. Cause life goes on
english.segment2: (chorus). But it won't mean a thing. Without you and the love you bring. It won't mean a thing. Without you
english.segment3: The wounds will heal. Starting over ain't no big deal. The rebuilt rome. And life goes on
english.segment5: The lesson learned. We all must take our turn. And carry on. Cause life goes on
